website_summaries.verdict: A quality vintage picnic basket that's reminiscent of a time when life was simpler. The classic design is  hard to find and cherished by those who own it.
pros: Split lid allows for dual entry and provides a flat surface for drinks
Works just as well as a shopping basket or to keep and transport baked goods
cons: Compared to others on our list, it's a bare bones option, but we love it nevertheless

customer_reviews.title: Where is the lid?!?!?
customer_reviews.text: I bought the above item to have little picnics with my daughters as a reward for doing good in school. We specifically picked this picnic basket because it "looked like the one in the movies". However, whenever it arrived...there is no lid on the basket. I am assuming and hopeful that this is just an error on my basket as the one pictured online and the tag attached to the basket both state there is a wooden lid. I was going to return the item for a refund and just purchase another basket elsewhere, however, it seems ridiculous that the cost to ship it back will be deducted from my refund whenever this was not my error to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Great wedding gift
customer_reviews.text: Great wedding gift. I bought this as a wedding gift for my grand niece. I had received a picnic basket as a wedding gift in 1968, and I still use it to carry food dishes to family dinners throughout the year. Someone always comments on the basket, so when my grand niece announced her engagement, I decided that this basket would be a good gift. It was. It is sturdy, beautiful, and a good large size. I added a red and white checkered "American Summertime Gingham Tablecloth 100% Cotton | Premium Quality" tablecloth (from Amazon) inside the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea H

customer_reviews.title: adorable!!!
customer_reviews.text: the picture isn’t great but this is a decent sized basket! fit a ton of food for me and perfect for a little picnic date, goes great with a red gingham blanket to match
customer_reviews.author: Anna A

customer_reviews.title: leatherette accent strap!!!
customer_reviews.text: I never received the leatherette accent straps to attach to the basket...I'm not sure if it was forgotten or what, also the poplar wood chipped not a big deal, Pretty upsetting considering i never got the leatherette accent straps especially since I planned a picnic today. I've attached makeshift straps for now, hopefully I can somehow get the straps sent to me? Then this will be a 5 star rating. Size is on point and is durable!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Picnic Basic
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this picnic basic. It is really well made. The wicker/straw is strong and the wood lid is appropriately thick. The basic holds much more than you think! We have already used it for several family picnics (family of 4). It is the quintessential picnic basic that I was looking for!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this picnic basket
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this picnic basket. It is very well made. I love the style and colors. It has the thing of old school wish I love it. It’s great for picnic at the beach for at the park. I will definitely it recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sila

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE LOVE LOVE this picnic basket
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE LOVE LOVE this picnic basket. The day after it arrived, I promptly prepared food for a picnic, packed the basket and spent the afternoon at a nice park. This is the best picnic basket on the Amazon site.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Um, yes!
customer_reviews.text: I love this basket! I was actually eyeballing it way before the whole COVID ordeal, and it just made sense to finally invest in a nice basket for our family to take out. Before, we were just throwing our stuff in a bag or whatever but this is so worth the expense. It’s really high quality, and I love the liner. It’s a really decent weight too, it isn’t like some cheap basket material, it can actually be pretty heavy when loaded. It looks cute at the park and beach too, and it’s easy to open and close the lids to keep our food accessible/safe. I would definitely buy again! It’s a family adventure staple now!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great basket
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this to go on a picnic with the girlfriend. Its not a bad basket but kinda expensive as it is just a basket. The basket is of good quality and it has a hard wooden cover which can also act like a table when your out picnicking. The size is a decent size as you can fit soda, chips and sandwiches. I honestly really like this basket but for $30 its kinda a steep price. I think $20 would of been more value for what your getting.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Liner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specific colour because my fiance and I had a theme, I was sent the black and white striped one instead and I don't have enough time between now and our picnic to return it. It's no big deal because I can make my own liner but I feel like quality control was not on top of things. Other than that the lids were attached and were in good shape and the basket itself is quite roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Katt and Jeff Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: The basket just arrived and it’s been rainy so I haven’t used it yet, however it matches the description and pictures exactly and is a perfect size. Some say it might be too shallow for them, but I don’t drink so I won’t be trying to fit any wine bottles here, and I intend to just use this for light lunches and snacking while enjoying nature. The only complaint I have is that it’s a little hard to make the wooden flaps on top stay open without holding it open. Would be less of a hassle getting stuff in and out if that was easier. Other than that, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: sunflowersweet

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the gray/white striped liner but the one I received was navy/white. I requested a replacement and the replacement was also navy/white. The box and label both said navy/white so it was truly the wrong color. I contacted customer support and it looks like they haven't updated the description.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Picnic in style 😍😍😍picnic basket
customer_reviews.text: Love this basket all across the board. Super cute! Easy to use, fits enough food and drinks up to 5 people. Prefect size. We took it to the creek, the beach, and soon to many more places. You can use the lids as a little surface for drinks and food. Great gift for those who likes to picnic in style 😍
customer_reviews.author: tdmd

customer_reviews.title: So cute and functional!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this basket! The top works perfect for a little table. So cute and functional. I tried the magnolia basket from target and the handles barely reach each other making it difficult to carry around. . I bought this one and everything about it was great!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: NICEE
customer_reviews.text: GOT THIS TODAY AND ITS QUITE NICE. I SEE VARYING COLORS OF WOOD ON OTHER REVIEW PICS BUT MINE IS A GORGEOUS HONEY COLORED WOOD ALL OVER. MINE DIDNT COME WITH A TAG, BUT SUPPOSEDLY ITS NEW....LOOKS NEW. I HAVE NOT USED IT YET BUT ITS SPACIOUS AND STURDY. SO NICE THAT I WANT TO PURCHASE ANOTHER FOR BACKUP BUT NOW AFTER READING OTHER REVIEWS, I MAY GET A BAD ONE. HOWEVER, THE ONE THAT I RECEIVED IS 40+ DOLLARS WELL SPENT.
customer_reviews.author: Prettygirl901

customer_reviews.title: good looking basket
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loved it when I showed up with this. More of a symbolic romantic gesture than anything else. But, it is certainly functional. More than enough room for anything you could want for a picnic for two including a bottle of wine.
customer_reviews.author: Matt M

customer_reviews.title: but not in a good way. You can see the wood peeling off ...
customer_reviews.text: The lids could use some improvement. It’s fairly rustic, but not in a good way. You can see the wood peeling off in certain areas. Not too bad, but you might have to sand it down a bit here and there to smooth it out. Good size and lightweight, so overall I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: I received my replacement is the right color and absolutely love it! Can't wait to use it
customer_reviews.text: I first received the wrong color option, which really wasn't a deal breaker but the basket was messed up in a few spots so I returned it. I received my replacement is the right color and absolutely love it! Can't wait to use it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, good quality, spacious
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this basket!! It shipped in record time and the sturdiness is pretty good. The storage capacity is a really nice amount- easily could fit a meal for two or a small family. I love that the wooden slats on top are attached with a velcro leather so you can remove it if you want to. I definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great and Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this wonderful picnic basket! It is the iconic picnic basket, so roomy, easy to carry and so sturdy. It came so fast and what photo ops ! It looks terrific in my kitchen, on the front porch! I can't wait to go on a picnic this weekend with my love. You won't be disappointed! Oh and the price!!! Perfect in my book!!! A great gift idea too. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Missing one of the leather straps for the lid. Lid was sent off of basket and not even attached. You could clearly tell whoever packed it knew it was missing a strap and should not have been sent that way. The lid itself looks like an after thought and something someone did a quick job cutting to sort of match. Overall I’m really disappointed in this. $40 is way too much for what this actually is. It’s unfortunate because my daughter loves picnics and this was a gift for her birthday, which is today so no time to get the matching strap.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Picnic Basket.
customer_reviews.text: I love this picnic basket! Its perfect...the size, not too big or too small, the design with the lid, if something is too long it can still close halfway. This will make a lovely gift to getting with a matching picnic blanket. I’ve used mine once and plan on using it again.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier than you would think but still treat it with fragility
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my lady. We both love it. It is a great size that could honestly pack for more than two people depending on what you want to pack (i.e. bottle of wine takes up a lot of space). I was a little worried about the connection of the panel covers to the frame of the basket. It is sturdy, but you want to always be cautious as it will probably be the first thing to go down the road in its life as it will wear the most often from movement. Can't recommend it enough. I do wish there were more colour/theme options.
customer_reviews.author: Richard White

customer_reviews.title: This basket really is as nice as it looks!
customer_reviews.text: This item looked so nice in the picture, but don't they always? To my surprise and delight, it was just as nice for real!! Very sturdy; top is easy open and securely attached; liner is decent fabric. I'm giving it as a Christmas gift and I'm sure it will be a cherished gift!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Got a returned basket?
customer_reviews.text: This basket is really cute, but I’m pretty sure I was sent a retuned one. There was no ticket on it and there’s dirt on it and an imperfection in the lid. It really sucks because I like it otherwise. I would ship it back, but because of the pandemic I’m not going outside just to ship it back.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: super spacious and bigger than i was expecting so it ...
customer_reviews.text: super spacious and bigger than i was expecting so it holds a lot! love the basket, looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Emily Su

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: My picnic basket arrived today as expected with 2-day shipping. It was a bit larger than expected, but that's my fault for not reading the dimensions. It is very lovely, and I cannot wait to use it to partake in my favorite Victorian pastime - a picnic! It looks as though it can hold a rather large lunch that could serve, say 2-4 people, as well as a bottle of wine and a baguette! The basket also has a nice, natural, woodsy smell to it that, normally, I wouldn't care for but, to my surprise, the smell is actually rather nice. Overall, I am very pleased with this purchase. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: L. Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color liner received
customer_reviews.text: Received the basket and I selected the “grey/white stripe” liner however I received a blue and white stripe liner in the basket. Cute basket but not worth almost $50 for a color I didn’t choose!
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Poorly packaged.
customer_reviews.text: I think my wife will like it when she sees it but I have to fix it first. It was very poorly packaged and I have to fix a ornamental strap that goes around the handle.
customer_reviews.author: frank rice

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved it, sturdy, and can actually fit a good amount of things I would definitely recommend this if you want to feel like you’re in a fairytale picnic ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Dara

customer_reviews.title: Customer Signature required
customer_reviews.text: Buyer's beware If you chose to buy this product. They will send it out via UPS customer signature required. Since I am still working full time during this pandemic, I am not available during the week between the hours of 1pm - 3pm. I have tried to work with UPS on several occasions to have this delivered during another time of day, but I have had not suck luck. It looks like a beautiful basket that would have been a lovely prop in our family portrait. I am sad that this did not work out and I will attempt to find comparable basket somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Given as a gift, nice product
customer_reviews.text: This picnic basket is very nice as a gift, however, do not misunderstand that it is empty of utensils other than the lining of the basket, which is very nice. Seems highly sturdy and very large.
customer_reviews.author: cindy62

customer_reviews.title: Top not attached
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful large basket. Well made However the top was not latched to the basket and no lashings were included. Also the color of the foldable top did not seem to match the woven basket. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Buffy

customer_reviews.title: Missing two straps for lid
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a nice quality basket but it’s missing two straps that hold the lid on. The quality control is questionable. There is no way to contact the seller either.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Odom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect picnic basket!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a romantic picnic and was not disappointed. Great size, looks cute, and will use again!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: How about a PIC-A-NIC Basket?
customer_reviews.text: What a great find. My family was looking for something traditional and warm that would really bring an extra big of magic to our picnic. Everything from design to utility makes this a great option for anyone else looking to add a traditional flair to an upcoming outing.
customer_reviews.author: Philip S Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy MF!
customer_reviews.text: I Love This Picnic Basket! Its a Very Durable And Reliable and it even holds heavy items to an extent since I Used It On Halloween to Carry My Nephews & Nieces pounds of candy! And that night was a success All thanks to This Basket!!! I Love It!!!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Niebla

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Purchased because of the photo and I loved the measurements and shape and I still do. The lids are weighty which I love but they look blah. They are secured with two vinyl hinges that do not appear to wear well. The liner is adorable red gingham however the fabric has to be trimmed of many many many threads. Love the size and shape however the price point does not connect to the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa from Maine

customer_reviews.title: Great Basket
customer_reviews.text: I love this basket. I use it for storing all the people, animals, and fences that go with my toy barn. My granddaughters love it. One side at a time will stay up as contents are explored. Toys stay clean while not in use.
customer_reviews.author: betsy davis

customer_reviews.title: Well made classic picnic basket!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't love this darling basket more! It's SO well made and perfect for picnics and tailgates! It's exactly what I wanted and at a fantastic price! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Bella Cruz

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for a classic picnic basket pull the trigger on this guy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect beautiful picnic basket, but I’m not sure if it’s just the one I got (even used it’s a great buy) but I got it to stuff with gifts for my best friend and I had to fix the lid pieces to the basket myself with butchers string, overall not much of an inconvenience but I do worry about how secure it’ll remain to be.
customer_reviews.author: J.Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: The cloth lining is thin and cheap but the basket is thick and seems strong and durable. It's large enough for items if you are adept at tetris you should be able to fit your food items nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Love love everything about my picnic basket, arrive on time very sturdy I can’t wait to used it and make so many memories specially during this quarantine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered without a top part, doesn’t look like shown on picture, had to return it!
customer_reviews.author: dk

customer_reviews.title: Cutest basket I’ve ever seen
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love everything about the basket, it’s so much bigger than I thought it would be, I’m so happy I made this purchase and it came a day earlier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy straps
customer_reviews.text: The lid stays on by a couple of leather straps that I found very flimsy and unwieldy. But I got some shoe laces swapped those in and it fixed my complaint
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Came with everything!!
customer_reviews.text: Despite so many reviews...I took a chance and bought this basket as a gift. It came with everything and is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good picnic basket I was able to pack sandwiches and drinks and snacks for 4 people in it without any trouble. Also being able too have the option to take off the lid or not is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Martin

customer_reviews.title: Happy Summer Picnic!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful basket. Great quality. Flat cover can serve as small table at any picnic. Solid and stable feel
customer_reviews.author: Georgette V.

customer_reviews.title: Timeless, so glad I got this.
customer_reviews.text: I love this, makes me enjoy our picnics more with it; what can I say :).
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Cincotta

customer_reviews.title: The lid means that I can keep some purchases or wallet in there and it's a little less easy to reach in and take them
customer_reviews.text: I use this basket to do grocery shopping. The lid means that I can keep some purchases or wallet in there and it's a little less easy to reach in and take them. There's rarely a shopping trip where people don't comment on how cute my shopping basket is, or ask whether there's a small dog in there.
customer_reviews.author: E. Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Picnic Basket
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Came in a huge box cut could have been protected better surrounded by paper and fragile sticker - neither was done. Luckily there was no damage
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Cute basket but poor lid design.
customer_reviews.text: The basket itself was perfect! The lid looked like someone's peepaw found some scrap wood and added it to the basket... very disappointed. Lid was not the same color, texture, or matetial. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Michael King

customer_reviews.title: picnic
customer_reviews.text: This basket is well made and looks adorable, just right for a summer picnic.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Loved loved loved it
customer_reviews.text: Loved loved the picnic basket. Perfect size it fit lots of stuff. Very sturdy and traditional looking with the red gingham design on the liner.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia M. Batiz

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a friend, as birthday gift. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cristian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect basket for a couple's picnic
customer_reviews.text: This picnic basket worked perfectly for me and my fiancé! It works very well as a two person picnic basket. It is very sturdy, and I love that the lining is removable so you can wash it. The lids are held together with two strips of leather, or something like leather, that uses velcro. They do come apart a little easier than I expected, but it isn't very complicated to put them back together so It wasn't a big issue for me. All in all I am more than happy with this purchase, and can't wait to use this basket over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Dettmer

customer_reviews.title: Picnic Basket
customer_reviews.text: I loved this basket! I used it for a picnic, the only thing I didn’t like was that you have to hold it open, the top doesn’t stay open on its own but other than that it’s a great basket!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Kindle

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY CAMPER!
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to buy this basket because of the negative reviews about the lids. I took a chance and I am very pleased. I love my basket and cannot wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Fox

customer_reviews.title: Cute and practical
customer_reviews.text: Love mine take it everywhere. It's good for lunch picnic or just a quick appetizer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good size for a picnic for 2
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our engagement shoot in the vineyards of Napa. Very rustic look and love how the cloth inside is detachable and easy to clean. The top is detachable too, though be careful with the wood as it can be a bit rough around the edges. This is a pure basket, doesn’t come with any utensils or plates.
customer_reviews.author: Ling

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this basket!!!!!! I bought it to present homemade bread to work potlucks and I am so happy with it! It's really a cute basket! I just need Toto now lol!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Great basket but there are no straps to connect the lid to the basket. So I just have two loose pieces of wood. The pictures clearly show there should have been leather straps to attach the lid. Pretty annoying
customer_reviews.author: jamie diamond

customer_reviews.title: Wizard of Oz prop
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a prop for The Wizard of Oz. It came very quickly and is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Picnic basket is as described, but my order came ...
customer_reviews.text: Picnic basket is as described, but my order came without one of the straps that holds the lid on top, which is an important asset to this basket. Very frustrating! I don’t want to go through the hassle of returning the whole thing and I would hope amazon could just send me the strap that holds the lid on top, but if needed, I will.
customer_reviews.author: snezana hadzialijagic

customer_reviews.title: Leather straps too short
customer_reviews.text: The basket is nice... I want to keep it and use it, but one of the leather straps that holds the lid on is too short. I cannot connect it securely with the velcro, so I feel like the lid will keep coming loose. If I could get a longer leather velcro strap, I would happily keep the basket.
customer_reviews.author: CWCgal

customer_reviews.title: Seems a good size
customer_reviews.text: Item came on time Packaged sturdy enough Going to make a good Christmas gift
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and holds a lot. Not miniature like I feared
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: Great little basket but can pack a mean picnic! Our family of six uses this often and it has held up lovely. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.D

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Good Size
customer_reviews.text: I like this picnic basket a lot. It comes with little straps to hold the top flaps on and they’re secured with Velcro so hopefully that’ll stand the test of time. But otherwise everything about it is great. It fits a good amount of food and feels very sturdy when I carry it. I would buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: RLT

customer_reviews.title: Soo cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest picnic basket ever!!! I love everything about it and its a perfect size. Even better than I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Greysi

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted a strong, authentic basket for awhile now. Chose this one against many others and boy am I glad I did! I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: sissy McKinney

customer_reviews.title: inside smaller than it looks
customer_reviews.text: it is cute, handy. mine came with a tear on the fabric on its side, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Picnic Basket
customer_reviews.text: The order came on time. It was like pictures but I wish it was a tad bit bigger. Serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: ... using this as a sewing & crafts basket ~ nice size.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this as a sewing & crafts basket ~ nice size ....
customer_reviews.author: GreensAndNettles

customer_reviews.title: It's so cute!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted a cute picnic basket like the ones in the movies, and welp Amazon delivered! I thought the basket would be a teensie bit darker, but it's still good. It has good room, you have space for some food and a picnic blanket maybe a couple of books (:
customer_reviews.author: Meli (:

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picnic basket
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely love's our new picnic basket. Big enough for food and most importantly our wine lol. Would recommend to anyone looking for a very nice picnic basket.
customer_reviews.author: Moses

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as it looks! Was worried about it breaking or getting damaged in shipping but it is well packaged, and a sturdy basket, besides.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Picnic Basket
customer_reviews.text: I just received my picnic basket today and it is perfect! I wanted a traditional basket so my Husband and I can take our Grandson on some picnics. There are no parts missing, it is a great size and looks like it should last a long time. I can't wait to use it! An added bonus - the box it was shipped in is the perfect size for our four year old Grandson to play in.
customer_reviews.author: Toni M.

customer_reviews.title: serves it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy I don't think it would keep food warm for too long it is just a basket after all.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Fun classic picnic hamper with plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: Just what I'd been searching for--classic look picnic hamper even with red gingham. Large enough to pack everything my family needs. Love it enough to display on top of my refrigerator when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Sugarplums

customer_reviews.title: The basket itself is so nice.
customer_reviews.text: Came earlier than expected. Great picnic basket. Seems strong. The lid may not stay fastened. I may have to work with that, but the basket itself is so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Blue eyes

customer_reviews.title: Simple and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A basic picnic basket with a large capacity basket. We didn't need a basket that included silverware and glasses. We just wanted lots of space and easy use. That is exactly what we got. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Listen. I needed these ( I bought 2) to be made correctly, they are missing a strap to secure the lid. That does not scream quality control. You apologize but do nothing to improve.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful perfect picnic  basket
customer_reviews.text: Absolute beautiful perfectly made basket at such a great price! I am in love with it and can't wait to use it all the time. Very well made! Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: season douglass

customer_reviews.title: Going to do our own Chopped kitchen mystery ingredients for each other and surprise the other,
customer_reviews.text: love it. made very well and super large. I could put Toto in here with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.R.

customer_reviews.title: WOW SO CUTE
customer_reviews.text: This basket is so cute and I used it on a date and it wasn't hard to carry even when full.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Schwarcz

customer_reviews.title: Great traditional picnic basket!
customer_reviews.text: Great classic picnic basket. I used it for a trip to the winery and for bringing food that I don’t want cold and soggy, like bread, almost anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The picnic basket is very durable
customer_reviews.text: I love the picnic basket. I actually was giving one a long time ago and decided to get a new one!
customer_reviews.author: DAWN FLEMING

customer_reviews.title: Best Picnic Basket Ever - Yogi Bear
customer_reviews.text: I love this basket! I use it for quick trips to the grocery store and I get so many compliments! It's also ideal to take to the park with the kids packed full of snacks and juice boxes. I can't say enough about this basket. It feels well made and I love how cute it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: In love with this classic study basket!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful basket! Very large and hold a lot. Makes picnics fun. Very classic style. Very study.
customer_reviews.author: Dymonde Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Charming basket
customer_reviews.text: Charming, attractive, usable basket. Good sized and evocative of picnics past.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Basket missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: I returned the picnic basket because the lids were missing
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Groesbeck

customer_reviews.title: No cloth
customer_reviews.text: I’m very upset because I’m going on a road trip and I will he having picnics all weekend and there is no cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Cute picnic basket
customer_reviews.text: This basket is so cute and is exactly as pictured. The picnic basket is pretty durable and can fit quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Tanbir M

customer_reviews.title: Missing key part!
customer_reviews.text: Missing strap on one side to hold lids on. Unusable in current condition. Not worth price charged for condition. I would be really embarrassed if it were sent as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. D'Haene

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: The strap to hold the lid on is missing, for the price you would think that they could have included all of the Pieces.
customer_reviews.author: KrisRenee

customer_reviews.title: In love !
customer_reviews.text: I love love love my new picnic basket! It’s perfect, sturdy yet light weight, and super cute!! A must have!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Mofrad

customer_reviews.title: Missing a Strap
customer_reviews.text: The velcro strap was missing on my picnic basket. I have emailed to get a new one, but have had no response.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts. Not as shown in pictures.
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts! The lid is not attached to the basket as is shown in all the photos of the product. There is not strap or tie to fasten it myself. Not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyM.

product_meta.title: Picnic Time Country Picnic Basket with Liner, Red/White Gingham
product_meta.description: Color:Red/White GinghamCountry basket Red and white gingham. Willow picnic basket with wooden split-lid design for dual entry. Includes removable cotton/poly liner. 17. 5" X 13" X 8/14"
feature_bullets: PERFECT DESIGN - Wicker picnic basket has a split, dual-entry lid that provides a level surface for food and drinks, and a removable cotton/polyester blend liner that is easy to clean
SIZE MATTERS - Measures 17-1/4 by 13-1/2 by 8-1/4 inches high ( 14-1/4 inches high including stationary woven handle), so you can fit all your picnic favorites!
DONT FORGET YOUR BLANKET - Look for our Picnic Time-ONIVA assortment of outdoor picnic blankets to create a matching set (sold separately)
LIFETIME WARRANTY-MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - Backed by the Picnic Time Family of Brands BUILT TO LAST Lifetime Guarantee
GO CLASSIC - The iconic Country Picnic Basket by Picnic Time in a traditional, hand-woven wllow design that will remind you of Dorothy and Toto in Oz, or any picnic scene from your favorite movie

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars535 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
